title: Windows 10 Update
body:
My laptop just updated windows 10 and now every time I start a new game on league, it crashes...
Anyone got any help or advice on how to stop it from crashing?

replies.body: A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing some freezing issues for players.  If this is the case for you, disabling it will get it fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues with additional details!

Thanks so much for this, I was so frustrated when it kept happening, and as far as I knew, nothing about my computer had changed.  Now I just have to let the afk buster run its course, since I am now in a low priority queue thanks to all those crashes making me unable to play :C
